text: Gumazir maba Israelian mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn gun Atrivim Devit geghani, kamaghɨn amizɨ, a ofa gamir gumazimning, Sadok ko Abiatar bagha akam amaga ghaze, “Kɨ kamaghɨn ifonge, ia nan akam isɨ Judabar gumazir dapanibav mɨkɨm suam, kɨ kagh ikia Israelia mɨgeir akaba baraki. Ia Judaba bizir tizim bagha Israelia ataghizɨ, me faraghavɨra nan azangsɨgha ghaze, kɨ ua uan dɨpenimɨn mangam?
